description: This file demonstrates how to connect to MCP servers using SSE transport with MCPTools and MultiMCPTools classes, and runs example agents with specific messages.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that interacts with models and tools.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for OpenAI chat models.

classes.name: MCPTools
classes.description: Tools class for MCP server communication using SSE transport.

classes.name: MultiMCPTools
classes.description: Tools class for connecting to multiple MCP servers with different transports.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Asynchronously runs an agent with a message, connecting via MCPTools with SSE transport.

methods.name: run_agent_with_multimcp
methods.description: Asynchronously runs an agent with a message, connecting to multiple MCP servers using MultiMCPTools.
